name: ld47.StackInTheLoop
description:
The small game we made with a team for ludum dare 47.

You are a race driver caught in a time loop. You need to collect "cones of time" to extend the loop and eventually break free.

Controls
* wasd - accelerate/brake/turn
* space - handbrake
* esc - pause
* r - start new loop

Viktoria Mitrofanova - scripting, music, ui
Mikhail Bragin - scripting
Alexander Fedorov - scripting, modeling
